Generation IV.Diamond: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
Generation IV.Pearl: With its sharp glare, it puts foes in a mild hypnotic state. It is a very fickle Pokémon.
Generation IV.Platinum: It hides its spiteful tendency of hooking its claws into the nose of its Trainer if it isn't fed.
Generation IV.HeartGold: When it's happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: When it's happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: With its sharp glare, it puts foes in a mild hypnotic state. It is a very fickle Pokémon.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Bewitches humans with its helical tail and piercing gaze. Its hidden claws are quite sharp as well, making this Pokémon an exceedingly tricky opponent if antagonized.

Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Routes 218 and 222 Grand Underground - Grassland Cave , Spacious Cave , Riverbank Cave , Sunlit Cavern , Still-Water Cavern (After defeating Candice )
